component.description:
EdgeX Device GPIO is a device service for connecting GPIO devices to EdgeX.
** Functionality ** * This device service uses sysfs ABI (default) or chardev ABI (experiment) to control GPIO devices For a connected GPIO device, update the configuration files, and then start to read or write data from GPIO device * This device service ONLY works on Linux system
